thread.title: Election Commission transfers Chennai Police Commissioner S. George ahead of R K Nagar by-polls
thread.title_full: Election Commission transfers Chennai Police Commissioner S. George ahead of R K Nagar by-polls

author: FE Online
title: Election Commission transfers Chennai Police Commissioner S. George ahead of R K Nagar by-polls
text:
Election Commission transfers Chennai Police Commissioner S. George ahead of R K Nagar by-polls Election Commission transfers Chennai Police Commissioner S. George ahead of R K Nagar by-polls Ahead of the R.K. Nagar by-polls, the Election Commission of India (ECI) has ordered the transfer of the Chennai Police Commissioner S. George on Saturday, in order to authorise free and fair polls. The order by the ECI has come up in the wake of the petition that was filed by the Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam […] By: FE Online | New Delhi   12:20 PM Chennai Police Commissioner S. George with Tamil Nadu Chief Secretary Girija Vaidyanathan. (PTI) 
Ahead of the R.K. Nagar by-polls, the Election Commission of India (ECI) has ordered the transfer of the Chennai Police Commissioner S. George on Saturday, in order to authorise free and fair polls. The order by the ECI has come up in the wake of the petition that was filed by the Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (DMK) for the Commissioner’s transfer. Karan Sinha has been appointed as the new Police Commissioner, earlier he was posted as the Additional Director General of Police in CB-CID. 
The petition to the ECI was filed by a delegation comprising of DMK MPs- T.K.S. Elangovan, R.S. Bharathi and Tiruchi Siva on March 17. The MPs have said that S. George could influence polling in favour of the ruling AIADMK 
Further details awaited.
